Title: This is the Item 1 in Collection Test 1
Description: Test of a collection created via an item and without metadata.

name: Item 1
xml:
<record xmlns="http://localhost/documents/" recordType="Item" public="1" featured="0" collection="Collection 1" name="Item 1">
        <elementSet name="Dublin Core">
            <element name="Title">
                <data>This is the Item 1 in Collection Test 1</data>
            </element>
            <element name="Description">
                <data>Test of a collection created via an item and without metadata.</data>
            </element>
        </elementSet>
    </record>

Title: This is the Item 2 in Collection Test 1
Description: Test of a second item with the same collection created via a previous item and without metadata.

name: Item 2
xml:
<record xmlns="http://localhost/documents/" recordType="Item" public="1" featured="0" collection="Collection 1" name="Item 2">
        <elementSet name="Dublin Core">
            <element name="Title">
                <data>This is the Item 2 in Collection Test 1</data>
            </element>
            <element name="Description">
                <data>Test of a second item with the same collection created via a previous item and without metadata.</data>
            </element>
        </elementSet>
    </record>

Title: Collection Test 2
Description: Test of collection with metadata created before item.

name: Collection 2
xml:
<record xmlns="http://localhost/documents/" recordType="Collection" public="0" featured="1" name="Collection 2">
        <elementSet name="Dublin Core">
            <element name="Title">
                <data>Collection Test 2</data>
            </element>
            <element name="Description">
                <data>Test of collection with metadata created before item.</data>
            </element>
        </elementSet>
    </record>

Title: This is the Item 3 in Collection Test 2
Description: Test of item inserted inside an existing collection.

name: Item 3
xml:
<record xmlns="http://localhost/documents/" recordType="Item" public="0" featured="1" collection="Collection 2" name="Item 3">
        <elementSet name="Dublin Core">
            <element name="Title">
                <data>This is the Item 3 in Collection Test 2</data>
            </element>
            <element name="Description">
                <data>Test of item inserted inside an existing collection.</data>
            </element>
        </elementSet>
    </record>

Title: This is the Item 4 in Collection Test 3
Description: Test of collection created via item.

name: Item 4
xml:
<record xmlns="http://localhost/documents/" recordType="Item" public="1" featured="0" collection="Collection 3" name="Item 4">
        <elementSet name="Dublin Core">
            <element name="Title">
                <data>This is the Item 4 in Collection Test 3</data>
            </element>
            <element name="Description">
                <data>Test of collection created via item.</data>
            </element>
        </elementSet>
    </record>

Title: This is the Item 5 in Collection Test 3
Description: Test of a second item in an existing collection, before metadata of collection.

name: Item 5
xml:
<record xmlns="http://localhost/documents/" recordType="Item" public="1" featured="0" collection="Collection 3" name="Item 5">
        <elementSet name="Dublin Core">
            <element name="Title">
                <data>This is the Item 5 in Collection Test 3</data>
            </element>
            <element name="Description">
                <data>Test of a second item in an existing collection, before metadata of collection.</data>
            </element>
        </elementSet>
    </record>

Title: Collection Test 3
Description: Test of a collection created by an item, but with metadata after.

name: Collection 3
xml:
<record xmlns="http://localhost/documents/" recordType="Collection" public="1" featured="0" name="Collection 3">
        <elementSet name="Dublin Core">
            <element name="Title">
                <data>Collection Test 3</data>
            </element>
            <element name="Description">
                <data>Test of a collection created by an item, but with metadata after.</data>
            </element>
        </elementSet>
    </record>
